node_info.name: openThesaurus
node_info.description: Get synonmns for German words using the OpenThesaurus API
node_info.subtitle: ={{$parameter["operation"] + ": " + $parameter["resource"]}}

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Get synonyms for a German word in German

options.name: Get Synonyms
options.description: Get synonyms for a German word in German

properties.name: text
properties.description: The word to get synonyms for

properties.name: options
properties.description: Specifies the basic form for the search term if it is not already a basic form

options.name: baseform
options.description: Specifies the basic form for the search term if it is not already a basic form

options.name: similar
options.description: This also returns up to five similarly written words for each answer. This is useful to be able to make a suggestion to the user in the event of a possible typing error.

options.name: startswith
options.description: Like substring = true, but only finds words that begin with the specified search term

options.name: substring
options.description: Whether up to ten words are returned for each answer that only contain the search term as a partial word

options.name: substringFromResults
options.description: Specifies from which entry the partial word hits are to be returned. Only works together with substring = true.

options.name: substringMaxResults
options.description: Specifies how many partial word hits should be returned in total. Only works together with substring = true.

options.name: subsynsets
options.description: Whether each synonym group has its (optional) sub-terms supplied

options.name: supersynsets
options.description: Whether each synonym group is supplied with its (optional) generic terms

operations.name: Get Synonyms
operations.description: Get synonyms for a German word in German

possibleValues.name: Get Synonyms
possibleValues.description: Get synonyms for a German word in German

subProperties.name: baseform
subProperties.description: Specifies the basic form for the search term if it is not already a basic form

subProperties.name: similar
subProperties.description: This also returns up to five similarly written words for each answer. This is useful to be able to make a suggestion to the user in the event of a possible typing error.

subProperties.name: startswith
subProperties.description: Like substring = true, but only finds words that begin with the specified search term

subProperties.name: substring
subProperties.description: Whether up to ten words are returned for each answer that only contain the search term as a partial word

subProperties.name: substringFromResults
subProperties.description: Specifies from which entry the partial word hits are to be returned. Only works together with substring = true.

subProperties.name: substringMaxResults
subProperties.description: Specifies how many partial word hits should be returned in total. Only works together with substring = true.

subProperties.name: subsynsets
subProperties.description: Whether each synonym group has its (optional) sub-terms supplied

subProperties.name: supersynsets
subProperties.description: Whether each synonym group is supplied with its (optional) generic terms

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
